content: double_crochet sts* repeat from *to* until you reach chain 3 join with slip_stitch into the top of the chain 3 change colour to cream round 14 slip_stitch into the next double_crochet st chain 3 double_crochet into next 23 sts 3 double_crochet into the chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet into the same chain space double_crochet into 24 sts skip next 2 double_crochet sts *double_crochet into next 24 sts 3 double_crochet into the chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet into the same chain space double_crochet into next 24 sts skip next 2 double_crochet sts* repeat from *to* until you reach chain 3 join with slip_stitch into the top of the chain 3 round 15 slip_stitch into the next double_crochet st chain 3 double_crochet into next 25 sts 3 double_crochet into the chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet into the same chain space double_crochet into 26 sts skip next 2 double_crochet sts *double_crochet into next 26 sts 3 double_crochet into the chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet into the same chain space double_crochet into next 26 sts skip next 2 double_crochet sts* repeat from *to* until you reach chain 3 join with slip_stitch into the top of the chain 3 fasten_off and weave in the yarn end sew the toy to the blanket by using the unused front loops blanket is done and it s now time to sew the bear onto the blanket  copyright © tatie soft toys 2018 page thirteen sew the bear onto the blanket by using the unused front loops copyright © tatie soft toys 2018 page fourteen congratulations  you have done your lovey  i hope you ve enjoyed crocheting your bear lovey blanket  let s keep in touch tatie soft toys on ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/tatiesofttoys tatie soft toy on etys https //www etsy com/uk/shop/tatiesofttoys tatie soft toys on lovecrocet https //www lovecrochet com/user/tatiesofttoys copyright © tatie soft toys 2018 page fifteen
